name: head-charge
caption: Head Charge

effect.short: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
effect.full: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage}.  User takes 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

flavorText:
The user charges its head into its target, using its
powerful guard hair. This also damages the user
a little.
